name: The Steve Series (Old Demo)
description:
The Steve Series is an original RPG about a child growing up with their best pal Steve as the two go on adventures in the world of dreams. Together they'll make wondrous friends and maybe save the world a few times as they go through the best and worst the world has to offer. TSS is a massive 4-Part game that spans many universes and explores themes like morality, mental illness/neurodivergence, gender, and sexuality.

To enter the Debug Room, go up to the wall to the left of Carl's bed and press Z multiple times until the game requests a password. Enter the passwords 'butts' to get in and access exclusive game content planned for future Parts.

This is only a demo, and contains two chapters from Part 1.
